Detailed Description

Equals the spirit:monitor element in IP-Xact specification.

MonitorInterface holds info on what kind of interface types this monitor can be connected to.

Exception guarantee: basic

Exceptions:
Parse_error Occurs when a mandatory element is missing in this class or one of it's member classes.
